DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to learn the pharmacokinetics of Ipilimumab when combined with Paclitaxel/Carboplatin or Dacarbazine
DOC.criteria: Histologic diagnosis of advanced malignant melanoma Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performances status 01 Measurable/evaluable disease as per modified World Health Organization (mWHO) criteria Evidence of active brain metastases Prior treatment with anticytotoxic lymphocyte antigen 4 (CTLA4) or antiCD137 (type of tumor necrosis factor) antibody Total Bilirubin greater than (>) 1.5 * upper limit of normal (ULN) and aspartate aminotransferase (AST) or alanine aminotransferase (ALT) > 2.5 * upper limit of normal (ULN) Prior Autoimmune disease Use of immunosuppressing therapies
